subject: Communication
title: Cultural Intelligence (CQ): The Skill of Adaptation
description: A 60-second lesson on Cultural Intelligence (CQ): The Skill of Adaptation.

hook.text: IQ is fixed. EQ helps you read a room. CQ â€” Cultural Intelligence â€” helps you read a room in any culture.

buildup.text: CQ has four dimensions: Drive (motivation), Knowledge (understanding), Strategy (planning), Action (adapting behavior).

discovery.text: Unlike personality traits, CQ is learnable. Travel, immersion, diverse relationships, and cross-cultural training all.

twist.text: High CQ doesn't mean knowing every culture. It means knowing how to learn any culture quickly and adapt your behavior.

climax.text: People with high CQ are more creative, better negotiators, and more effective leaders in diverse environments.

punchline.text: You don't need to know every culture. You need to learn how to learn them.

quiz.question: How many dimensions does Cultural Intelligence (CQ) have?
